# Preface {.unnumbered}

This book compiles essential knowledge about [*iSEE*][bioc-isee], an R package released through the Bioconductor project.

This book covers essential knowledge for three main groups of users:

- End users interacting with the graphical user interface in their web browser.
- Developers of scripted web-applications using iSEE to showcase data sets.
- Developers of extensions contributing new functionality and packages to the iSEE ecosystem.

See @isee_2018 for the original publication.

[bioc-isee]: https://bioconductor.org/packages/iSEE/
